@sparkyhollyhead hey guy, look if your having issues what you need to do is go here on your pc:
C:\WINDOWS\Fonts then unzip the files or what ever and add them to that folder :) done

@@@ Installation Instructions @@@

Go to the folder where the fonts are located,

Do a search for the fonts in the main folder containing the fonts,

Ctrl+A to select all of them

Open \Control Panel\Appearance and Personalization\Fonts

Drag the fonts from the search into this.

Windows will install the fonts.

Done.

This is a decoy file.
Probably being seeded by a font company.
I checked the fonts -- these are not the most expensive at all. 90% of them you can download off dafont.com. If you are looking for a simple download with alot of fonts, then download this. But this ISN'T a collection of nice or expensive fonts.
